segments.text: My birthday ? I forgot it , Thank you for remembering my birthday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to offer you my congratulations on your birthday and best wishes for your future happiness , good health and continued success . I've asked the Fairy Flowers to send you a bunch of flowers . I hope you'll like them .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks a lot . I'm so touched .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now let me sing " Happy birthday " for you .
segments.speaker: S2
